content: This PR has been open for about three weeks and hasn't received a review
The topic of nimbers is admittedly a bit niche, but really none of what I'm doing at this point is more advanced than the Wikipedia summary.
Oh, wrong channel :frown: is there a way to move this to #PR reviews ?
This topic was moved here from #triage > #16088 Initial development of nimbers by Kevin Buzzard.

Are there specific interested people that you can ping? Niche topics need reviewers, and they don't need to be drawn from the "official" maintainers and reviewers. Finding other people interested in the topic is a sufficient (and sometimes necessary) start.

(And it can also be super useful to say here on zulip "X has had a good look at this PR, and I've dealt with the suggestions from Y, so could a reviewer or maintainer please take a look now?" That will get faster action! :-)
Hm, maybe someone like @Junyan Xu or @Yuyang Zhao? Nimbers are closely related to game theory after all
Or @Daniel Weber who's been helping with formalizing the algebraic closure argument
